snippet.title: Starfire (PC-9821/256 Color Gameplay in 16:10)
snippet.description:
Wanted to showcase Starfire's 256 color version since I couldn't find any videos of it.  I think it's a pretty cool game, especially for the music.

It's debatable weather or not this game should be shown in pixel-perfect 16:10 or stretched to 4:3 like some monitors will display a PC-98.  Some visuals look correct displayed in 4:3 (like the first cutscene), and others look correct in 16:10 (the in-game character portraits).  I've uploaded separate videos of both 16:10 and 4:3 versions of this gameplay footage on my channel.
